response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $15,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its true worth and the value it offers, I kindly propose a price of $14,000 for this remarkable item. This offer allows you to acquire an asset of such high caliber at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 14000}
